name: SquareIdle Indev v.1.0.2
description:
SquareIdle is a game I'm for now on going to work on. This time its an actual "game" now, although you cannot save as of right now. It's still in development and will be for sometime. Likely will adjust values. Enjoy this "game".

Indev v1.0.2 Update -

  • New "Idle Bronze" upgrade that is better than Idle
  • Nerfed Idle and Idle Value
  • Removed "Color" option for now
